name: Global Research Conference on Applied Science , Engineering and Technology
content: and Technology organized by Foster Research. Global Research Conference on Applied Science, Engineering and Technology (GRCASET2024) is going to be held on August 26-28, 2024 at Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia focusing on the theme “Technological Developments & Modern Trends in Applied Science, Engineering and Technology”. This conference aims to bring together the scientists, researchers, and research scholars to share and exchange their experiences, knowledge and results of research work conducted by them on all aspects of Applied science, Engineering and Technology. This is a very good platform for Researchers, scholars and many other industrial professionals.
